----- Original Message -----
From: "muaddib74447" <muaddib1974@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, April 27, 2002 3:21 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Can Someone Help Me


> Was wondering, when I try to email from my personal email-the email
> never shows up. My email address is verified etc, I can come on here
> and post and it shows up instantly, I can also post from my yahoo
> email and it shows up within few seconds. My wife posts from hers-
> which her email is through same place mine is and she can post from
> the email with no problems.
> Why can I not post via email? Anyone able to help me?
> David

Have you actually subscribed to the group using your home email address, or
are you only subscribed through your yahoo email account?

Matt
